projects.title: PROJECT OPTIMIZER

images.alt: Mobile version of Project Optimizer image
Desktop version of Project Optimizer image

projects.description: This project aims to optimize and streamline project workflows. Includes features such as task management, resource allocation, and progress tracking.
tasks: Conducted a thorough requirement analysis to understand client needs.
Designed and implemented a user-friendly interface with React and TypeScript.
Integrated various APIs for seamless data flow and management.
